thread.title: Ted Cruz Jokingly Tweets Deadspin ‘Proof’ of Basketball Skills, Gets ‘Go Eat Sh*t’ in Response
thread.title_full: Ted Cruz Jokingly Tweets Deadspin ‘Proof’ of Basketball Skills, Gets ‘Go Eat Sh*t’ in Response

author: Josh Feldman
title: Ted Cruz Jokingly Tweets Deadspin ‘Proof’ of Basketball Skills, Gets ‘Go Eat Sh*t’ in Response
text:
Ted Cruz Jokingly Tweets Deadspin ‘Proof’ of Basketball Skills, Gets ‘Go Eat Sh*t’ in Response by Josh Feldman | 8:32   
Deadspin yesterday took notice of a profile of Senator Ted Cruz that contained a small little tidbit about how he plays basketball: 
Cruz appears intent on building—and in some cases repairing—personal relationships with Republican senators. He started a weekly basketball game in the Russell Building, for example, and has been urging colleagues to attend. (Cruz is said to be a surprisingly good jump-shooter with miserable form.) Tim Scott has played, and Marco Rubio is said to be joining soon. 
Deadspin asked for proof of Cruz’s basketball skills, and the senator himself obliged: 
— Ted Cruz (@tedcruz) January 25, 2017 
(And before you ask, no, that’s not a photo of Cruz, but of Grayson Allen . He jokingly acknowledged the meme that they look alike.) 
Deadspin tweeted this in response: @tedcruz Go eat shit.
